summary: An ordinance accepting a deed of conveyance from George E. Thomas and Elsa R. Thomas, his wife, dated November 6, 1907, conveying to the City of Seattle, the following property: beginning at the point which is 180 feet north of and 30 feet east of the stone monument set for the intersection of Evanston Avenue and North 44th Street; said distance being measured respectively parallel with the west and south marginal lines of block 9, Motor Line Addition to the City of Seattle; thence west 38.75 feet along the south line of lot 7, block 9, of said addition; thence northerly 100 feet to a point on the north line of lot 10, block 9, of said Addition; said point being 37.5 feet west of and 100 feet north of the point of beginning; thence east along the north line of lot 10, 37.5 feet; thence south 100 feet to point of beginning.
